definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Located in Suzhou Xiangcheng Economic Development Zone, we plan to start our operation in 2016.
sentences.chinese: 公司計劃於2016年下半年開始正式運營生產。

sentences.english: Performance was much stronger during the latter half of the six-month reporting period.
sentences.chinese: 更強的性能在下半年的申報期內六個月。

sentences.english: Citigroup also plans to introduce a new stock option program later this year.
sentences.chinese: 該集團也計劃在今年下半年實行新的股票選擇權方案。

sentences.english: Cervical spondylosis is a very common condition that usually occurs in the second half of life.
sentences.chinese: 頸椎病是非常普遍的情況下通常發生在下半年的生活。

sentences.english: The ground-breaking is expected some time in the second half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 廣珠城際快速軌道有望今年下半年開工。

sentences.english: Reporters also learned that the second half of this year the airport will be a large-scale capital investment.
sentences.chinese: 記者還了解到，今年下半年首都機場將大規模招商。

sentences.english: China welcomes the upcoming visit by Parliamentary Presiding Officer Speaker of the Parliament Roger Abiut to China in the second half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 我們歡迎阿比尤特議長今年下半年訪問中國。

sentences.english: The outer harbour site will be cleared before the end of this year, and restructured for a new casino project - "Oceanus".
sentences.chinese: 新八佰伴原址於下半年改爲海洋之神娛樂場項目。

sentences.english: And rebuilding after the floods and tornadoes may deliver a fillip in the second half of the year.
sentences.chinese: 而且洪水以及龍捲風後重建也可以刺激下半年的經濟。

sentences.english: The picture is taken 17th, Nov, 2007 on Yulong, Sanzao Village, Jinwan Zone, Zhuhai City.
sentences.chinese: 2007年下半年我在珠海市金灣區三竈鎮魚弄。

sentences.english: 'We will be able to deliver sustained revenue growth' in the latter half of the year, Mr. Pinault said.
sentences.chinese: 皮諾特說，我們有能力在下半年保證收入的持續增長。

sentences.english: Late in 1857 the Victorian government repealed the Act as ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 1857年下半年，維多利亞州政府廢除該法令。

sentences.english: Gameela is running for parliament in the elections scheduled for later this year.
sentences.chinese: 加梅拉將在今年下半年的大選期間競選議員。

sentences.english: I am Nanjing, Shenzhen in the second half to go to work.
sentences.chinese: 我是南京人，下半年要去深圳工作了。

sentences.english: In my consciousness, this is the cut-off point of a year.
sentences.chinese: 在我的意識中，這個時候是上半年和下半年的分界點。

sentences.english: China in late 2007 has all the marks of a bubble economy.
sentences.chinese: 2007年下半年的中國有着各種泡沫經濟的標誌。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
